channel.title: Game crashes and gun disappears.
channel.description: Hello fine folks of Black Mesa. I've got a few problems with this otherwise fine game. And I promised my self to stay calm. So here it goes. These problems / crashes all occur at the 'Surface Tension' level. The first problem is : I can't see my gun. It suddenly disappeared some-how. I only see the crosshair. (see screenshot) The second problem is : When I get to the point, to shoot the helicopter down with the rocketlauncher the first time. The game crashes, and I get the "hl2.exe has stopped working" message. So, please help me. I added those .mdmp files with this message below. The screenshot.. ![](upload://nao8UHpx2AGQJSyFu5Dx4VWbYXY.png) - My pc hardware is : Intel i7 hexa-core 3.20ghz. Sabretooth x58. 12gb installed mem. Asus geforce GTX580. item.title: Game crashes and gun disappears.
item.dc:creator: bennyvx78
item.description:
Oké. I have found the sollution. It turned out, that I was messing with the audio and video settings, in the middle of the game. That why it crashed etc.
So now, I leave those alone and now I can play normaly. The only problem I have now, is a “crash to desktop” and some kind of error message about a failed dumb file or something.

I’ll make a screenshot of that error…If I ever get one again.
